file title  : Staub and Rosenzweig Zobler Area Codes
data type   : byte
file type   : binary
columns     : 360
rows        : 180
ref. system : lat/long
ref. units  : deg
unit dist.  : 1.0000000
min. X      : -180.0000000
max. X      : 180.0000000
min. Y      : -90.0000000
max. Y      : 90.0000000
pos'n error : unknown
resolution  : 1.0000000
min. value  : 0
max. value  : 8
value units : geographic area codes
value error : unknown
flag value  : none
flag def'n  : none
legend cats : 9
category  0 : 0
category  1 : 1 AFR       Africa
category  2 : 2 AUS       Australia, South Pacific
category  3 : 3 EUR       Europe
category  4 : 4 NAM       North America
category  5 : 5 NCA       North Central Asia
category  6 : 6 SAM       South America
category  7 : 7 SAS       Southern Asia
category  8 : 8 SEA       South East Asia
comment     : no data are provided for water areas or Antarctica
comment     : first column is category number, second column is code
